data.name: A Last Will and TESTament
data.detailed_description:
Steam Exclusive Offer






About the Game

ABOUT

A Last Will and Testament is first person adventure horror game in escape room style with lots of puzzles to solve. Fulfill the last will and find a testament.


FEATURES

  • 100 Steam Achievements hidden in the haunted house! Find it!
  • Story & voice-over
  • Beatiful and creepy graphic
  • Creepy haunted house ambience and music
  • Puzzles
  • Good optimization
  • Hot price
  • Save/load game any time
  • Autosave
  • Keyboard or gamepad controls
  • 29 langauges
  • Options (graphics, audio, configure controls, invert y-axis, subtitles, mouse/gamepad sensitivity etc.)
  • Notes
  • Linux, Windows and Mac OS support
  • All resolution supports (21:9, Ultrawide etc.)
  • Steam clouds
  • Steam remote (TV, phone etc.)

https://store.steampowered.com/app/2014930/A_Last_Will_and_Testament/

data.short_description: First-person adventure horror game in an escape room style with nice graphics, inventory, story, voiceover and good price & gameplay. Solve puzzles, collect notes. Fulfill the last will and find a testament. Loosely inspired by Play with Me: Escape room
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, Czech, Danish, Finnish, Greek, Spanish - Latin America, Dutch, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish*, Portuguese, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Romanian, Swedish, Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese, Hungarian
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows
  • Processor: AMD A10-7890K processor (2016 release date) Intel Core i5 4690 / AMD Ryzen 5 1500X or Potato Int3l
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GeForce GTX 760 2GB or legendary GeForce GTX 1060 6GB
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7/10/11
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Legendary GeForce GTX 1060 8GB or NVidia GeForce GTX 1070 8GB or RTX 3060 TI
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOS
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon HD 7500G/Intel HD Graphics 3000
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS 64 bit (Apple Silicon or Intel)
  • Processor: Intel Core i8
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon Pro 5300
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia & AMD (512MB VRAM)
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Linux 64 bit Ubuntu
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3570K or AMD FX-8320
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia & AMD (1GB VRAM) or legendary GeForce GTX 1060 8GB or RTX 3060 TI
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
